description: Try our easy to follow Mashed Egg & Cucumber Crispbreads + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mashed Egg & Cucumber Crispbreads + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Lebanese cucumber, cut into stick (for snack)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC (160oC fanforced). Line a baking tray with baking paper. Using a 10cm heart cookie cutter, cut hearts from tortillas. Place hearts on prepared tray.

Combine parmesan and paprika in a small bowl. Spray hearts lightly with oil, and then sprinkle with the parmesan mixture. Bake for 68 minutes or until golden. Set aside to cool completely. Store in an airtight container. Serve with salsa. Snack 1: Mash eggs with yoghurt. Top crispbread with cucumber and the egg mixture. Snack 2: Tomatoes and cheese.
